issue.summary: GeneID: 171429 (Slc26a6), assembly gap
issue.description: Gap in reference assembly between CAAA01111125.1 and CAAA01200220.1 disrupts alignments of NM_134420.2 (Slc26a6 GeneID: 171429)
issue.resolution_text: The addition of WGS AEKQ02060806.1 to the gap between AC168054.4 and AC242672.2 closes the gap in the assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 235779 (Nlrp4g), order and orientation
issue.description: Nlrp4g (Gene ID: 235779) has been reported missing from reference chromosome 9; this gene is only found on an unplaced chr. 9 contig.
issue.resolution_text: NT_166313.1 is now localized and has been added to the Chrom. 9 TPF, giving full representation of NM_001004145.2.

issue.summary: GeneID: 270118 (Maml2), assembly gap, chromosome
issue.description: Assembly gap causing non-alignment of exon 1 (nts 1-604) of NM_032427.1
issue.resolution_text: Unlocalized WGS contig NT_166314.1 will be placed in the Chrom. 9 TPF to give full representation of NM_001013813.2.

issue.summary: GeneID: 406176 (Olfr151), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will investigate further with C57BL/6J DNA PCR
issue.description: The reference genome contains a 1 nt deletion compared to NM_207664.1 resulting in a frameshift and premature termination.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 258872 (Olfr908), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will investigate further with PCR on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: The reference genome contains a 1 nt deletion compared to NM_146872.1 resulting in a frameshift and premature termination.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 71538 (Fbxo9), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: reference genome has a 1-nt deletion compared to NM_023605.2 resulting in a frameshift and premature termination.
issue.resolution_text: Splign error and a non-consensus splice site determined for this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 83995 (Mmp1a), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will investigate further with PCR on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: AC115689.22 has a 1-nt deletion compared to NM_032006.3 introducing a stop codon into the genome sequence
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 12581 (Cdkn2d), may be redundant
issue.description: NM_009878.2 has two nearly identical alignments to the reference assembly and WGS components
issue.resolution_text: We will remove WGS piece CAAA01140679.1 from Build 38 as it is redundant with current Reference component AC122525.4.

issue.summary: Lack of alignment between CT030683.6/ CT009708.6 causing contig building problems
issue.description: Lack of alignment between adjacent TPF components CT030683.6/ CT009708.6 causing contig building problems
issue.resolution_text: CT867967.3 (RP24-275P14) has been removed from the TPF

issue.summary: Possible WGS fill in gaps near distal chr.9
issue.description: WGS may need to be added to fill gaps between clones on the chr. 9 TPF
issue.resolution_text: Unique WGS components CAAA01190053.1 and CAAA01064987.1 are now in the TPF. All other components of the previously stated contig are either 1. redundant with what is already in the TPF or 2. don't belong to the region.

issue.summary: Mm37 chr.9 unlocalized contig NT_166313 may belong on distal chr. 9
issue.description: Mm37 chr.9 unlocalized contig NT_166313 may belong on distal chr. 9
issue.resolution_text: WGS contig NT_166313.1 has been added to the TPF between components AC168021.4 and AC225723.3 in the Chrom. 9 TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 19054 (Ppp2r3d), assembly gap, unplaced contig
issue.status_text: RP23-182D4 was selected for sequencing to extend off of AC168021.4
issue.description: Variants NM_011154.2 and NM_001163415.1 of Ppp2r3d are not represented in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 665033 (Gm7455), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Single nucleotide (T) insertion in reference component AC119951.12 causing a shortened protein as compared to NM_001167923.1.
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoints were curated to use alternate overlapping sequence from AC120386.12.

issue.summary: GeneID: 68380 (0610042G04Rik), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: We will perform radioactive hybridization in an effort to close this gap.
issue.description: 0610042G04Rik is not represented in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC172194.1/AC169127.3
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between accessions AC172194.1 and AC169127.3 in the TPF
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap region can be followed in MG-4172 and MG-4173.

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC113082.6/AC154740.2
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC113082.6 and AC154740.2 in the TPF.
issue.resolution_text: AC113082.6 has been updated to AC113082.7 (vector sequence removed), fixing the half-dovetail join between AC113082 and CT025561.

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC132474.3/AC140409.3
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC132474.3 and AC140409.3 in the TPF.
issue.resolution_text: WI1-1735G24/AC242690.3 closes the gap between AC132474.3 and AC140409.3

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC158384.2/AC160134.2
issue.status_text: Long-range PCR will be attempted in an effort to get sequence for this gap
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC158384.2 and AC160134.2 in the TPF. This is a type 3 gap.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC173343.1/CT573422.5
issue.status_text: We will perform gap PCR in an attempt to close this gap
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC173343.1 and CT573422.5 in the TPF
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC155925.2/AC160129.2
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC155925.2 and AC160129.2 in the TPF.
issue.resolution_text: AC241535(RP23-358J5) is finished and spans the gap. The TPF has been updated and shows two green ball joins on either side of AC241535.

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC134825.5/AC120390.12
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between AC134825.5 and AC120390.12 in the TPF. This is a type 3 gap.
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap should be followed in MG-4174.

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC165425.2/AC192862.1
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between AC165425.2 and AC192862.1 in the TPF
issue.resolution_text: The progress of this ticket can now be followed in MG-4176

issue.summary: GeneID: 258781 (Olfr915), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: We will investigate this further with PCR on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: There is a stop codon and a prematurely truncated protein in NM_146785.1 in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Ch. 9 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 3 - AC168054.4/AC174646.2
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between AC168054.4 and AC174646.2 in the TPF. This is a type 3 gap.
issue.resolution_text: The progress of this gap can now be followed in MG-4175

issue.summary: Chrom 9 Pre-Telomeric Gap
issue.description: Chromosome 9 sequence does not extend into telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC225723.3, placed at the distal end of the Mouse Chrom. 9 Reference TPF, removes the pre-telomeric gap for the Reference chromosome.

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in the Reference component AC123708.17
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC123708.17
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint for the overlap between AC123708 and AC137127 has been changed to reflect AC137127.11's sequence in the overlap.

issue.summary: Possible over-collapsed repeat in clone sequence.
issue.description: Possible over-collapsed repeat in AC131780.5. Alignment of traces derived from C57BL/6J shows >425X coverage for this region.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 9 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC168021.4 and AC225723.3
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate issue to MG-3938.

issue.summary: Chr. 9 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: RP23-182D4 was selected for sequencing to extend off of AC168021.4
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC168021.4 and AC225723.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC225723.3 Should Be in "minus/-" Orientation for GRCm38
issue.description: AC225723.3 should be placed in "minus/-" orientation for GRCm38
issue.resolution_text: AC225723.3 has been changed to the "minus/-" orientation in the Mouse Chrom. 9 TPF.

issue.summary: Chrom. 9 Reference Assembly replacement of WGS
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has WGS CAAA0126031.1 spanning a gap between components AC160050.2 and CT486009.11.
issue.resolution_text: Sequenced component AC215885.3 was inserted in the TPF between AC160050.2 and CT486009.11 to replace WGS component CAAA0126031.1

issue.summary: Chrom. 9 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has a gap between AC162375.2 and AC161590.2
issue.resolution_text: CU024893.21 was sequenced to close the gap between AC162375.2 and AC161590.2 , formerly occupied in part by WGS components CAAA01160259.1 - CAAA01181941.1

issue.summary: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 9 unlocalized scaffold NT_166314.1?
issue.description: Should we retain MGSCv37 chr. 9 unlocalized scaffold NT_166314.1 in future assemblies?
issue.resolution_text: Scaffold NT_166314.1 has been added to the Chrom. 9 TPF in preparation for Build38, with the exception of CAAA01039976.1 and CAAA01039979.1 as they are redundant with component AC242667.3.

issue.summary: GeneID: 258472 (Olfr899), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: We will conduct PCR on C57BL/6J DNA to determine if NM_146479.1 (Olfr899) is found in the Reference Genome (C57BL/6J).
issue.description: NM_146479.1 (Olfr899) is missing from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 258874 (Olfr900), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: We will conduct PCR on C57BL/6J DNA to determine if NM_146874.1 (Olfr900) is found in the Reference Genome (C57BL/6J).
issue.description: NM_146874.1 (Olfr900) is missing from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 630836 (2010315B03Rik), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization will be performed in an attempt to pull clone sequence into the gap.
issue.description: BC029716.1 has poor alignment to the Reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC172194.1 and AC242667.3 in GRCm38
issue.status_text: We will attempt PCR in an effort to close this gap with sequence other than WGS.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3728
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC242667.3 and AC241616.3 in GRCm38
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization probes have been created.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3728
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC242673.3 and AC242670.3 in GRCm38
issue.status_text: We will attempt gap PCR in an effort to close this gap.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3734.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC168054.4 and AC242672.2 in GRCm38
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization probes have been generated.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3845
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC242682.3 and AC140491.4 in GRCm38
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of ticket MG-3735
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC158516.2 and AC160017.2
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC158516.2 and AC160017.2 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between AC158516.2 and AC160017.2 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: Curate alignment for AC159893.2 and AC174644.2
issue.description: Alignments associated with AC159893.2 and AC174644.2 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between AC159893.2 and AC174644.2 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: Curate alignment for CT010570.17 and AC160113.2
issue.description: Alignments associated with CT010570.17 and AC160113.2 in the GRC database require curation.
issue.resolution_text: A curated single alignment for the overlap between CT010570.17 and AC160113.2 has been loaded to the GRC database and marked as 'preferred'.

issue.summary: GeneID: 75135 (4930526I15Rik), order and orientation
issue.description: Region of WGS sequence in GRCm38 may be ordered incorrectly
issue.resolution_text: Celera WGS components CAAA01154301.1, CAAA01217562.1, CAAA01108492.1 and CAAA01125382.1 have been set to 'minus' orientation on the Chr. 9 TPF and the Chr. 9 patches TPF to correct the alignment of Ppp2r3d.

issue.summary: Ppp2r3d is in the incorrect orientation on the Chr. 9 fix patch MG132_PATCH
issue.description: Ppp2r3d is in the incorrect orientation on the Chr. 9 fix patch MG132_PATCH. This is Genbank accession KB469738.2 and RefSeq accession NW_004450259.2
issue.resolution_text: WGS pieces CAAA01154301.1, CAAA01217562.1, CAAA01108492.1 and CAAA01125382.1 have been flipped to correct the alignment of Ppp2r3d to the Reference Assembly.

issue.summary: GeneID: 20616 (Snap91), assembly gap
issue.description: A gap exists between assembly components CAAA01206853.1 and CAAA01161750.1
issue.resolution_text: CT025628.2 spans the gap between AC159811.2 and AC156831.2, so WGS is no longer needed.

issue.summary: GeneID: 63859 (Impg1), assembly gap
issue.status_text: Current resources/technologies have been exhausted in attempting to close this gap
issue.description: Gap in reference assembly between CAAA01176093.1 and CAAA01224609.1 disrupts alignments of NM_022016.1 (Impg1 GeneID: 63859)
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 66396 (Ccdc82), missing in assembly
issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization will be performed in an attempt to close this gap.
issue.description: GeneID: 66396 (Ccdc82), missing in assembly
issue.resolution_text: na
